author: Gus_263
title: Simple
review: It is a simple set, because it is promotional. Like other promo sets, it is very useful to make creations. This, option for make little cars. The pilot minifigure, to make of citizens or of course, pilots. The wheels to make a little car, and the red pieces to any red car (or ferrari) maded with system bricks. I rate it 5/5 because it is useful and one of my most ancient sets.

author: Krogh
title: Simple but good
review:
Nice little set, think i bought it when we made a "pit stop", ofcourse in a shell station, on a family vacation waaaay back, just so i'd have something to do on the long trip.

I remember always racing this against the older "Sprint Racer" (6503), and funny enough, the old one always won the match, hehe. This set is very simple, not much to it, not many parts, and a one-piece chassis, so it's a very simple build.

The minifig is excelent, only thing is, who wears sunglasses, while wearing a helmet, with a black visir? They didn't think that one through, did they? 

I remember really liking the slick tyres, which i think was still a new thing back then, but i'm not sure, so correct me if i'm wrong. Anyway, they didn't make as much noise or vibritions when driving them over a smooth surface, so that was a nice detail.

But anyway, as i said, it's a nice little uncomplicated set, fit's your town's racetrack really well, along with some of the other F1 racers/go-carts out there. :)

4/5, because, in my opinion it could have a bit more detail, as well as a bit more parts.

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Town (Racing) - Formula 1 Racing Car Review
review:
This is a fun little set to have and it's fun to play with as well.

Box/Instructions

The instruction has only 2 pages and there're no mistakes in it.

Parts

This set has a lot of good and useful pieces which can be used for future MOC's and/or brickfilms for sure. I really like the printed slope with the number '1' on it.

Minifigures

This set has one minifig. The figure has a white overall, a red helmet, a black visor and black shades on his face.

The build

The build is very fun and easy and we also don't need to worry about stickers.

The completed model

[img]http://www.klokriecher.de/gallery_pics/l/2535-1.jpg[/img]


This set may doesn't do much but it is still very fun to maneuver it. The only play feature which this model has is that the rear-wing does sviwel. This vehicle has a very good design - even if it doesn't really look like a Formula 1 car.

Summary

All in all this set is an great set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de

Videos I made of this set:

Stopmotion

Review

author: legominifig221
title: small and simple
review:
This is a promo set so it doesnt have much detail.It also doesnt have many parts.It looks nice and doesnt fall apart easily.The build is very simple.The car has a one-piece chasis and a nice minifigure.The playability is low because its just a simple car.If you had a similar car you could have a race.This set is geat for beginers.

 

Overall a small,simple little set.
